alert.note: Alert for Adams; Claiborne; Franklin; Jefferson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 6:36PM CDT until April 17 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... Franklin County in southwestern Mississippi... Adams County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 745 PM CDT. * At 636 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Yokena to near Church Hill to 6 miles southwest of Vidalia, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Church Hill around 640 PM CDT. Fayette, Sibley and Stampley around 650 PM CDT. Kingston, Mcnair and Hamburg around 655 PM CDT. Hermanville around 700 PM CDT. Garden City and Union Church around 710 PM CDT. New Hope around 715 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Roxie and Meadville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
